name: Fallacy (Itsjustkewa)
description:
The aim of the project is to create a media learning game. The created game would be one of the learning tools for the media literacy subject and also a helpful tool in media literacy training.

Media Game is a learning game that can be used to learn (and also test) media literacy skills in a playful way. The target group of players is (mainly) young people aged 15-20 (including high school students).
